page.title: 15VILLAGE DESCRIPTION-BLEWBURY
page.content: BLEWBURY IS A PRETTY VILLAGE AND HAS A POPULATION OF 1383 AND IS MADE UP OF 544 HOUSEHOLDS. THERE ARE MANY THATCHED COTTAGES AND A MIXTURE OF OLD AND NEW PROPERTIES AND AN EVER RUNNING STREAM MEANDERS THROUGH THE VILLAGE.IN THE CENTRE WHITE THATCHED,SAXON WALLS BORDER NARROW LANES, JOINING ONE STREET TO ANOTHER AND YET RETAINING CAR FREE AREAS WHERE PLEASANT WALKS LEAD THE VISITOR TO EVER CHANGING GLIMPSES OF OLD COTTAGES AND NEW HOUSES SNUGGLING BEHIND HEDGES AND TREES IN GARDENS FULL OF SHRUBS AND FLOWERS. BLEWBURY IS A VILLAGE MUCH FAVOURED BY RETIRED PEOPLE. IT IS A QUIET PLACE AND YET OFFERS A BUSY SOCIAL LIFE THROUGH ALL THE VARIOUS ACTIVITIES WHICH CAN ATTRACT THE OLD AND THE YOUNG ALIKE.DURING THIS CENTURY, COUNCIL HOUSES, MOBILE HOMES AND CARAVANS HAVE BEEN ADDED FOR THE WORKING POPULATION.
